comments.text: Virat sir all the best for the decider we hope u bring the border gavaskar trophy home and thx for motivating us always....

If Virat Kohli has million number of fans i am one of them. if Virat kohli has ten fans i am one of them. if Virat kohli have only one fan and that is me. if Virat has no fans, that means i am no more on the earth. if world against Virat, i am against the world. i love Virat kohli till my last breath.... Die Hard fan of Virat Kohli. . Hit Like If you Think Virat kohli Best Batsmen & Smart Player In the world.

bhai form wapis lai k aaa yaar we want to see run machine not bowling machine.... please bro don't play risky shots you are a great batsman i want my hero back in form.... Aussies are making fun of u.. give ur best :)

If Virat Kohli has million number of fans i am one of them. if Virat kohli has ten fans i am one of them. if Virat kohli have only one fan and that is me. if Virat has no fans, that means i am no more on the earth. if world against Virat, i am against the world. i love Virat kohli till my last breath.... Die Hard fan of Virat Kohli. . Hit Like If you Think Virat kohli Best Batsmen!
Love from #Bangladesh
